166 Perspecfives in Microbiology 

currence of combination between the virus and tissue substance. 
 /. Exptl. Med., 83:105-132, 1946. 

13. De Mars, R. I., Luria, S. E., Fisher, H., and Levinthal, C. The 
 production of incomplete bacteriophage particles by the action 
 of proflavine and the properties of the incomplete particles. Ann. 
 Inst. Pasteur, 84:113-128, 1953. 

14. Dulbecco, R., and Vogt, M. One-step growth curve of Western 
 equine encephalomyelitis virus on chicken embryo cells grown in 
 vitro and analysis of virus yields from single cells. /. Exptl. Med., 
 99:183-199, 1954. 

15. Eaton, M. D. Chemotherapy of virus and rickettsial infections. 
 Ann. Rev. Microbiol., 4:223-246, 1950. 

16. Eaton, M. D., Perry, M. E., Levenson, C. G., and Gocke, I. M. 
 Studies on the mode of action of aromatic diamidines on in- 
 fluenza and mumps virus in tissue culture. /â€¢ Immunol., 68:321- 
 334, 1952 

17. Fitzgerald, R. J., and Lee, M. E. Studies on bacterial viruses: II. 
 Observations on the mode of action of acridines in inhibiting 
 lysis of virus-infected bacteria. /. Immunol, 52:127-135, 1946. 

18. Foster, R. A. C. An analysis of the action of proflavine on bac- 
 teriophage growth. /. Bact., 56:795-809, 1948. 

19. Friend, C. Effect of 2,6-diaminopurine on virus of Russian spring 
 summer encephalitis in tissue culture. Proc. Soc. Exptl. Biol. 
 Med., 78:150-153, 1951. 

20. Ginsberg, H. S., Goebel, W. F., and Horsfall, F. L., Jr. The in- 
 hibitory effect of polysaccharide on mumps virus multiplication. 
 /. Exptl. Med., 87:385-410, 1948. 

21. Ginsberg, H. S., and Horsfall, F. L., Jr. Characteristics of the 
 multiplication cycle of pneumonia virus of mice (PVM). /. Exptl. 
 Med., 93:151-160, 1951. 

22. Ginsberg, H. S., and Horsfall, F. L., Jr. Quantitative aspects of 
 the multiplication of influenza A virus in the mouse lung; rela- 
 tion between the degree of viral multiplication and the extent 
 of pneumonia. /. Exptl. Med., 95:135-145, 1952. 

23. Ginsberg, H. S., and Horsfall, F. L., Jr. Therapy of infection with 
 pneumonia virus of mice (PVM); effect of a polysaccharide on 
 the multiplication cycles of the virus and on the course of the 
 viral pneumonia. /. Exptl. Med., 93:161-171, 1951. 

24. Henle, W. Studies on host-virus interactions in the chick embryo- 
 influenza system: I. Adsorption and recovery of seed virus. J. 
 Exptl. Med., 90:1-11, 1949. 

25. Hershey, A. D. Intracellular phases in the reproductive cycle of 
 bacteriophage T2. Ann. Inst. Pasteur, 84:99-112, 1953. 

26. Hershey, A. D., and Chase, M. Independent functions of viral 
 protein and nucleic acid in growth of bacteriophage. /. Gen. 
 Physiol, 36:39-56, 1952.
